title: Quick and Easy Pimento Cheese
directions: In a medium bowl combine Cheddar cheese, Colby cheese, pimentos, creamy salad dressing, salt and pepper.  Add more or less creamy salad dressing to achieve desired texture.  Mix well.
ingredients: 2 (4 ounce) jars diced pimento peppers, drained
1/2 (16 ounce) jar creamy salad dressing (e.g. Miracle Whip)
